Summary: I had a close encounter of the 1st kind at a drive in movie in the summer of 1975
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Braintree
There were no other sightings in Braintree on or around July 15th 1975
divs: sighting detailsin the summer of 1975 i was 10 years old and went to the drive in movies in braintree massachusetts with 2 of my older brothers we were watching a movie i think it was true grit starring john wayne we noticed people getting out of there cars and looking and pointing up we got out to see what was going on i remember very clearly seeing a round reddish glowing object floating about 100-150 feet in the air completely silent and still. it looked about 20-30 feet wide and 5-10 feet thick it was saucer shaped i was looking for a pole or a pipe that should be holding it up but there was no pole i was amazed at this it seemed to be perfectly positioned to watch the movie we stared at it for about a minute or 2 i looked away a few times to see the other peoples reactions and looking for the pole i thought must be holding it up there and then it was gone we all looked at each other and didnt know what to say we all got back in our cars and continued to watch the movie we went home and told our mother and she laughed and dismissed it and i didnt tell anybody until years later i tell people now and they look at me funny and roll there eyes i am convinced we saw an aien craft from another world there is no doubt these aliens were curious and were interested in the movie i have never seen anything like it before or since except pictures and videos online or in books there were at least 100 people that witnessed this event i wish i wrote down the date time and movie we were watching i didnt realize back then how rare it is to see something like this i often drive by that old drive in off route 128 which is now a logan express bus terminal that goes to logan airport the screen is still standing and i saw it the other day and said to myself i am going tell the story and go public i dont care if peoplelaugh at me i know what i saw and it wasnt an illusion or venus or swamp gas it was an alien visitation and they are 100% real and the government knows it would create panic so i think its a good idea to cover it up and slowly release this information i would if i was in charge. *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
